about_the_game:
Nestled within galaxy NGC 43324 lies the earth-like planet Proteus, the home of ExoCross! Take on a (literally) out-of-this-world racing challenge featuring wild off-road terrain, powerful open-wheel vehicles, slipstream-powered boosts, and unparalleled handling, and see if you can become the greatest off-road racer in the galaxy!

4CPT physics: Fully-simulated chassis and suspension components and a soft-body tire model create realistic weight transfer and understeer/oversteer. Bring your rallying and off-road skills to Proteus and you’ll be rewarded!

Slipstream and boosts: Put the power down in the right places to charge past your opponents, or slot in behind them to recharge your boost as quickly as possible.

Three unique cars: Take the wheel of three distinct cars, each more challenging and powerful than the last. Start off in the approachable Vulcan XC-1500, enhance your skills in the more powerful Orion XC-3000, and see if you’ve got what it takes to master the fire-breathing Titan XC-7000.

Dozens of circuits: Do battle on 19 distinct track layouts—each raceable in both directions—across four unique zones. From desert-like sands to forest dirt, pavement, and even a track high above the ground, you’ve never seen racing like this.

AI Racing and Career Mode: Advance through six racing series, two per car, to establish yourself as the top driver in ExoCross, going into battle with challenging AI opponents in up to 10-race seasons. Just want to pick up and play? Pick any car and track combo you want and hit the track!

Challenge Mode: Take on 48 unique challenges across all four zones and showcase your top speed against a global leaderboard.

Online racing: Face off with global players in a mix of Challenges and circuit races, with player votes determining every car and track selection. When the community decides, will you have the skills to make the best of the rounds ahead?

Slipstream and boosts: Put the power down in the right places to charge past your opponents, or slot in behind them to recharge your boost as quickly as possible.

Dozens of circuits: Do battle on 19 distinct track layouts—each raceable in both directions—across four unique zones. From desert-like sands to forest dirt, pavement, and even a track high above the ground, you’ve never seen racing like this.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: ExoCross

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews:
“ExoCross brings iRacing tech and quality to arcade racing—and the results are out of this world.”
The Drive

“Mixed with things like AI and tire models from iRacing, ExoCross is a full package racer that you may not expect when looking at it from the outside.”
Insider Gaming

“We found the visuals (on PC) of the beta build to be mightily impressive, the vehicle handling demanding and the lure of leaderboard times strong.”
Traxion GG
short_description: ExoCross is an offroad racing game introducing 4CPT vehicle physics (4-way contact patch traction technology). A soft-body tire model allows for competitive time attack and multiplayer wheel to wheel racing.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian
